article_title: There’s no simple cure for the crushing cost of medicine
article_text:
Overall prescription costs jumped nearly 14 percent last year

Making expensive drugs affordable is the public’s No. 1 health care priority

One couple loses home, declares bankruptcy

article_metadata.title: There’s no simple cure for the crushing cost of medicine | The Kansas City Star

og.description: Making expensive drugs affordable is the public’s top health care priority. Overall prescription costs spiked nearly 14 percent from 2014 to 2015, rising to $374 billion last year. That’s double the growth rate over the previous five years. The high prices of some drugs have begun causing angst not just for the patients who have to pay for them but for the doctors who prescribe them.
